thread.title: Luka Modric receives special dressing room tribute after making 200 appearances for Real Madrid
thread.title_full: Luka Modric receives special dressing room tribute after making 200 appearances for Real Madrid

author: Marc Isaacs
title: Luka Modric receives special dressing room tribute after making 200 appearances for Real Madrid
text:
Sport Luka Modric receives special dressing room tribute after making 200 appearances for Real Madrid Modric has been one of the star performers for the Spanish giants following his move from Spurs and was given a special shirt to mark his landmark achievement on Sunday Share Modric celebrates a special record against Real Betis on Sunday (Photo: Angel Martinez) Share Get Real Madrid CF   Thank you for subscribing!   
Luka Modric was given a special dressing room tribute from his team-mates after reaching a landmark 200 appearances for Spanish giants Real Madrid. 
Modric has been a revelation for the La Liga leaders following his £33million move from Tottenham back in August 2012. 
The Croatia international has been instrumental in helping Madrid win the Champions League in 2014 and 2016 and has won the Copa de Rey and UEFA Super Cup. Modric is a big favourite at Madrid (Photo: Denis Doyle) Read More Sergio Ramos admits Real Madrid's style of play must improve after ugly win 
Modric was rewarded for his efforts when he was handed a Madrid shirt with Modric 200 written on the back by Madrid president Florentino Perez following the 2-1 win over Real Betis on Sunday. 
Modric couldn’t wait to post the picture on his Instagram account with the captain: '200...reasons for the honor, privilege and pride. And most of all when the challenges and expectations are higher than ever! Hala Madrid forever.’ 
The 31-year-old said he was proud of his achievements and hopes to win even more silverware in the future. Instagram 
Modric, speaking on Real Madrid’s website, said: "I'm very happy and proud to be part of this great club. 
"It means a lot to me. I wish I could play 200 more games, win lots of titles and give our fans a lot of joy. Modric wants to win more trophies at Madrid (Photo: Angel Martinez) 
"I believe that I've improved a lot as a player and a person, because being surrounded by great players on a daily basis helps your development out on the pitch. 
"I'm pleased, and now I have to keep giving my all for Real Madrid." Like us on Facebook
